佳肴: (かこう) - delicacy; rare treat; good-eating fish
佳良: (かりょう) - good; favourable; favorable; successful
佳辰: (かしん) - lucky day; auspicious occasion; happy day
佳醸: (かじょう) - sweet sake; good wine
併さる: (あわさる) - to get together; to unite
併せて: (あわせて) - (esp. 合わせて, 合せて) in all/in total/collectively; (esp. 併せて) in addition/besides/at the same time
併せる: (あわせる) - to match (rhythm, speed, etc.); to join together/to unite/to combine/to add up; to face/to be opposite (someone); to compare/to check with; to cause to meet (e.g. an unpleasant fate); to place together/to connect/to overlap; to mix/to combine; to put blade to blade/to fight
併せ持つ: (あわせもつ) - to own (something) as well; to have two things (at the same time) (e.g. good and bad points)
併せ用いる: (あわせもちいる) - to use jointly; to use at the same time
併せ考える: (あわせかんがえる) - to consider together
併催: (へいさい) - (from 併用開催) combining a pair of events; joint
併合: (へいごう) - merger; joining into one; melding; merging; annexation; absorption
併合用ファイル: (へいごうようファイル) - merge file
併合罪: (へいごうざい) - concurrent offenses; concurrent offences
併呑: (へいどん) - annexation; merger; swallowing up
併売: (へいばい) - bundle selling; selling different kinds of products together; concurrent selling
併用: (heiyou) - usando juntos (em conjunto), usado ao mesmo tempo
併用治療: (へいようちりょう) - combined treatment; combination therapy
併用療法: (へいようりょうほう) - combined therapy
併発: (へいはつ) - concurrence; coincidence; complication (in illness)
併置: (へいち) - juxtaposition; placing side by side
併行: (へいこう) - (並行, 併行 only) (going) side-by-side/abreast; concurrent/occurring together/at the same time; (平行 only)  parallel
併設: (heisetsu) - joint establishment (especialmente escolas de diferentes níveis ou diferentes cursos de estudo), establishment as an annex (e.g. of a school), juxtaposition, placing side by side
併走: (へいそう) - running parallel (to); running side-by-side; keeping pace (with)
併進: (へいしん) - keeping pace with/keeping abreast of/advancing together; (並進 only)   translation
併音: (ピンイン) - Pinyin (chi:); Chinese romanization system
併願: (へいがん) - applying to enter more than one school
併願受験: (へいがんじゅけん) - taking the extrance exams of multiple schools
使: (shi/tsuka) - use , messenger; klesha (polluting thoughts such as greed, hatred and delusion, which result in suffering)
使い: (tsukai) - recado, missão, ir como enviado; mensageiro, portador, menino de recado, menina de recado; espírito familiar; uso, utilização, usuário, treinador, domador, encantador
使いきる: (つかいきる) - to use up; to exhaust; to wear out
使いこなす: (つかいこなす) - to handle (men); to master (a tool); to manage; to acquire a command of (a language)
使いっぱしり: (つかいっぱしり) - gofer; dogsbody; person who is made to do things or get things for someone else
使いっ走り: (つかいっぱしり) - gofer; dogsbody; person who is made to do things or get things for someone else
使いで: (つかいで) - lasting quality; good wearing ability; going a long way
使いなれる: (つかいなれる) - to get accustomed to using
使いにやる: (つかいにやる) - to send a person on an errand
使いに遣る: (つかいにやる) - to send a person on an errand
使いの者: (つかいのもの) - messenger; envoy; emissary
使いまわす: (つかいまわす) - to use one thing for several purposes/to use the same thing on multiple occasions; to work someone hard/to order around/to boss
使いものにならない: (つかいものにならない) - no use; useless; not fit for its purpose
使いやすい: (つかいやすい) - easy to use
使いわけ: (つかいわけ) - proper use; using (different things) for different purposes
使いわける: (つかいわける) - to use properly; to use (different things) for different purposes
使いをやる: (つかいをやる) - to send a messenger
使い倒す: (つかいたおす) - to use within an inch of its life; to use every little bit of; to get the most out of
使い先: (つかいさき) - the place where one is sent on an errand
使い出: (つかいで) - lasting quality; good wearing ability; going a long way
使い出す: (つかいだす) - to start using; to try out
使い分け: (つかいわけ) - proper use; using (different things) for different purposes
使い分ける: (つかいわける) - to use properly; to use (different things) for different purposes
使い切る: (つかいきる) - to use up; to exhaust; to wear out
使い勝手: (つかいがって) - ease of use; user-friendliness; usability; utility
使い古す: (つかいふるす) - to wear out (something)
使い回す: (つかいまわす) - to use one thing for several purposes/to use the same thing on multiple occasions; to work someone hard/to order around/to boss
使い尽くす: (つかいつくす) - to use up; to squander
使い心地: (つかいごこち) - ease of use; pleasantness of use; comfort level
使い慣らす: (つかいならす) - to accustom oneself to using; to train; to break in (horses)
使い慣れる: (つかいなれる) - to get accustomed to using
使い手: (つかいて) - user/consumer/employer; master (e.g. of swordsmanship); prodigal/spendthrift
使い捨てる: (つかいすてる) - to use and then throw away
使い捨てパスワード: (つかいすてパスワード) - disposable password
使い捨て装置: (つかいすてそうち) - throw-away device
使い方: (つかいかた) - way to use something; treatment; management (of help)
使い易い: (つかいやすい) - easy to use
使い果す: (つかいはたす) - to use up; to squander
使い果たす: (つかいはたす) - to use up; to squander
